query:
SELECT tc.*, u.name, u.email 
FROM trip_collaborators tc 
JOIN users u ON tc.userId = u.id 
WHERE tc.tripId = 1 AND u.email = 'mikgrn@gmail.com';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2cdS9hyY6XNQUTe.root --database 2rtwtAqF2DqhH9oEcii9XY --execute SELECT tc.*, u.name, u.email 
FROM trip_collaborators tc 
JOIN users u ON tc.userId = u.id 
WHERE tc.tripId = 1 AND u.email = 'mikgrn@gmail.com';
